headline: AM Best Affirms Credit Ratings of Chubb Perú S.A. Compañía de Seguros y Reaseguros
summary: MEXICO CITY, September 04, 2025--AM Best has affirmed the Financial Strength Rating of A (Excellent) and the Long-Term Issuer Credit Rating of "a+" (Excellent) of Chubb Perú S.A. Compañía de Seguros y Reaseguros (Chubb Perú) (Lima, Peru). The outlook of these Credit Ratings (ratings) is stable.
